testcase.name: searchEmptyProduct

failure.message: Empty search behavior changed. expected [https://www.flipkart.com/] but found [https://www.flipkart.com/search?q=iPhone%2015asdasdasdasd1234iPh&otracker=search&otracker1=search&marketplace=FLIPKART&as-show=on&as=off]
